message.content:
cs.CR, cs.GT, cs.SI, cs.AI, cs.SE

The paper deals with the detection of Advanced Persistent Threats (APTs) in cyber systems, which falls under the category of computer security (cs.CR). The proposed approach uses game theory to model the interaction between the attacker and defender, which suggests the paper may also belong to the sub-category of game theory (cs.GT). The use of dynamic information flow tracking and multi-stage attacks suggests the paper may also belong to the sub-category of systems and control (cs.SI). The paper also mentions the use of algorithms and computation, which suggests the paper may belong to the sub-categories of artificial intelligence (cs.AI) and software engineering (cs.SE).
